hero.description: Highly skilled Front-End Web Developer with a strong focus on modern front-end and back-end technologies. Proficient in building robust, scalable web applications, following best practices and bringing best user experience to customers. Adaptive to any workflow and technological stack, with a good sense of responsibility and passion for solving challenging problems.

card_1.title: Full-Stack Web Developer
